entry.title: Log4j Configuration JBoss AS 7.1
entry.content:
I had been working around this issue of setting up Log4j for an application running in JBoss AS 7.1 for some time, though there are posts in the , post 1, which gives an idea on how to set it up, I would like to put down the whole picture together here for anyone who might be stuck with this issue. So here it is,

The premise here is, to have custom log4j configuration for the application

  • 1. Have log4j.xml in the classpath. Can be placed directly in the resources folder of any of your deployments
